sentence.english: She isn't wearing her new blouse today.
sentence.spanish: Ella no lleva puesta su blusa nueva hoy.

sentence.english: Are you knitting that cardigan for your sister?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estás tejiendo ese cárdigan para tu hermana?

sentence.english: He forgot his coat at the restaurant yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Él olvidó su abrigo en el restaurante ayer.

sentence.english: They are buying a beautiful dress for the wedding.
sentence.spanish: Ellos están comprando un vestido precioso para la boda.

sentence.english: I don't like wearing hoodies in summer.
sentence.spanish: No me gusta llevar sudaderas con capucha en verano.

sentence.english: Is she wearing her leather jacket?
sentence.spanish: ¿Lleva puesta su chaqueta de cuero?

sentence.english: We weren't wearing jeans at the formal event.
sentence.spanish: No llevábamos vaqueros en el evento formal.

sentence.english: She always wears leggings to the gym.
sentence.spanish: Ella siempre lleva mallas al gimnasio.

sentence.english: Aren't you changing into your pyjamas?
sentence.spanish: ¿No te estás cambiando a tu pijama?

sentence.english: He ironed his shirt this morning.
sentence.spanish: Él planchó su camisa esta mañana.

sentence.english: They aren't wearing shorts in this cold weather.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no llevan pantalones cortos con este frío.

sentence.english: Is she wearing the blue skirt or the black one?
sentence.spanish: ¿Lleva la falda azul o la negra?

sentence.english: I always wear warm socks in winter.
sentence.spanish: Siempre llevo calcetines calentitos en invierno.

sentence.english: He didn't wear his best suit to the interview.
sentence.spanish: Él no llevó su mejor traje a la entrevista.

sentence.english: Are you wearing that woolen jumper?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llevas puesto ese jersey de lana?

sentence.english: She isn't wearing tights with that dress.
sentence.spanish: Ella no lleva medias con ese vestido.

sentence.english: We were wearing matching tops yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Llevábamos tops a juego ayer.

sentence.english: Do you usually wear a tracksuit for exercising?
sentence.spanish: ¿Sueles llevar chándal para hacer ejercicio?

sentence.english: He is pressing his trousers for the meeting.
sentence.spanish: Él está planchando sus pantalones para la reunión.

sentence.english: I don't wear white T-shirts often.
sentence.spanish: No suelo llevar camisetas blancas.

sentence.english: She always buys cotton underwear.
sentence.spanish: Ella siempre compra ropa interior de algodón.

sentence.english: Are you wearing your new boots in the rain?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llevas puestas tus botas nuevas bajo la lluvia?

sentence.english: We weren't wearing flip-flops at the beach.
sentence.spanish: No llevábamos chancletas en la playa.

sentence.english: He doesn't wear sandals to work.
sentence.spanish: Él no lleva sandalias al trabajo.

sentence.english: Are they polishing their shoes for the party?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están limpiando sus zapatos para la fiesta?

sentence.english: I always wear comfortable trainers for walking.
sentence.spanish: Siempre llevo zapatillas deportivas cómodas para caminar.

sentence.english: He isn't wearing a belt with those trousers.
sentence.spanish: Él no lleva cinturón con esos pantalones.

sentence.english: Do you wear a cap when it's sunny?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llevas gorra cuando hace sol?

sentence.english: She lost her gloves last winter.
sentence.spanish: Ella perdió sus guantes el invierno pasado.

sentence.english: Aren't you wearing a hat in this cold?
sentence.spanish: ¿No llevas sombrero con este frío?

sentence.english: He is wrapping his scarf tightly around his neck.
sentence.spanish: Él se está envolviendo la bufanda fuertemente alrededor del cuello.

sentence.english: I don't wear a tie on Fridays.
sentence.spanish: No llevo corbata los viernes.

sentence.english: She never takes off her silver bracelet.
sentence.spanish: Ella nunca se quita su pulsera de plata.

sentence.english: Are you wearing the earrings I gave you?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llevas puestos los pendientes que te regalé?

sentence.english: He bought her a beautiful necklace for their anniversary.
sentence.spanish: Él le compró un collar precioso para su aniversario.

sentence.english: They aren't wearing their wedding rings today.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no llevan puestos sus anillos de boda hoy.
